Seattle.description: Confidential local hotline connecting survivors to shelters, advocacy, and resources.

Seattle.name: YWCA Gender-Based Violence Services
Seattle.description: Survivor-centered services including crisis intervention and safety planning.

Seattle.name: New Beginnings
Seattle.description: Provides housing assistance, advocacy, and counseling for survivors.

Seattle.name: API Chaya
Seattle.description: Support services for Asian and Pacific Islander survivors of domestic violence.

Seattle.name: Emergency Services
Seattle.description: Call immediately if you are in danger.

Los Angeles.description: County-wide hotline providing crisis support and shelter referrals.

Los Angeles.description: Emergency shelter, counseling, and advocacy services.

Los Angeles.name: House of Ruth
Los Angeles.description: Provides emergency shelter, transitional housing, and legal advocacy.

Los Angeles.description: Support services for Asian and Pacific Islander survivors.

Los Angeles.name: Emergency Services
Los Angeles.description: Call immediately if you are in danger.
